ContentDesc_Arkadion - Superschwergewich: The legendary Lindwurm, a serpentine beast renowned for its unequaled regenerative abilities. The president had long sought to heal his ailing fighters with these powers to no avail, only finding success after making the ultimate sacrifice. But what if the Lindwurm's regeneration truly had no limitâ”€what if it could recover from even the most grievous wound? You imagine that dreadful battle once again, now more dreadful still...
